we petition the obama administration to:
Investigate the background of the regional CEO of Twitter é™ˆè‘µ, who is related to Ministry of State Security of China.

Twitter is almost the only one effective platform for Chinese Dissidents and netizens sharing infornation forbidden by China government, and protecting themselves by updating their realtime state about whether they are safe or being arrested by China Government.

However, a female named 'é™ˆè‘µ' who used to be the CEO of a company that is highly related to the Ministry of State Security of China, has recently been appointed to be the regional CEO of Twitter in Greater China. This is a severe threat to the Chinese struggling for free speech. And it is also a penetration to the science and technology society of US.

Imagine there is a ISIS member working in Twitter !

To stop this, a serious investigation of 'é™ˆè‘µ''s background should be started immediately!
